LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv1.description: Binshō (Agile) Step Tip 1: Across the various skills, you can get up to 16 permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv2.label: Agile Step Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv2.description: Binshō (Agile) Step Tip 2: Level 3 and 4 of this buff grant permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeed.label: Agile Step
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeed.description: Binshō (Agile) Step: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
